catalogPage.title: Curated Works
catalogPage.description: Immerse yourself in a spectrum of experimental art pieces. Refine the collection with intuitive filters to discover the work that resonates with your interior and sensibility.
catalogPage.noResults: No works are available right now
catalogPage.noMatches: No works match the selected filters

workDetails.notFoundDescription: The requested piece is no longer in the collection or the link is incorrect. Return to the catalog to continue exploring the avant-garde universe.

notFoundPage.title: The page dissolved into abstraction
notFoundPage.description: The address you entered doesn't exist or has been moved. Continue exploring the avant-garde universe from the links below.

serverErrorPage.title: Something broke behind the scenes
serverErrorPage.description: Our studio systems hit an unexpected error. Try the previous page again or contact us so we can resolve it quickly.

cartPage.title: Your cart
cartPage.description: Finalize your selection and provide the delivery details to reserve these works. All orders are reviewed personally by the artist studio.

errors.authRequired: Sign in to finalize your order
errors.submit: We couldn't submit the order. Please try again.
errors.noItems: Add at least one artwork before placing an order.
errors.permission: You do not have permission to place this order.

cartPage.confirmation: Request sent — we will contact you shortly

dashboardPage.welcomeAnonymous: Welcome back to your collector space

orders.heading: Orders
orders.error: We couldn't load your orders right now.
orders.empty: You have not placed any orders yet.

chat.heading: Direct atelier line
chat.description: Discuss artworks, shipping, or commissions directly with the artist studio.
chat.helper: All updates will arrive in real time — feel free to introduce yourself and outline your request.

adminWorksPage.title: Manage works
adminWorksPage.description: Maintain the live catalogue by adding new pieces, updating details, and curating what is visible to collectors.

errors.load: We couldn't load the works right now.

list.empty: No works have been published yet

errors.title: Provide titles in EN and RU
errors.description: Provide descriptions in EN and RU

login.title: Sign in
login.description: Enter your credentials to access the collector dashboard and manage your orders.

register.title: Create account
register.description: Register to save favourites, track pre-orders, and receive atelier updates.

errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Try again later.
errors.unexpected: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.unauthorized: You do not have permission to view this section

chat.empty: No messages yet — start the dialogue.

errors.send: Unable to send message. Try again.

admin.title: Studio communications
admin.heading: Collector conversations
admin.description: Monitor ongoing discussions and reply as the artist or studio curator.
admin.refreshHint: Chat list refreshes automatically when new messages arrive.
admin.selectPrompt: Choose a collector chat or enter a UID to begin messaging.
admin.notAuthorized: Admin rights are required to access the studio inbox.

summary.title: Order confirmation
summary.subtitle: Pre-order received
summary.description: Thank you for your reservation. The studio will contact you shortly to finalise payment and shipping details.

history.title: Order history
history.description: Track every reserved artwork and monitor their fulfilment status.
history.error: We couldn't load your order history.
history.empty: No orders yet — your future acquisitions will appear here.

admin.title: All studio orders
admin.description: Monitor collector purchases, confirm logistics, and coordinate delivery statuses.
admin.error: Unable to load orders right now.

homePage.intro: Avant-garde visions unfolding in immersive digital canvases. Explore a world of daring colors, architectural rhythms, and expressive abstraction shaped for the modern collector.

aboutPage.description: Biography, manifestos, and press materials will live here. Frame the artist's journey across experimental mediums and the inspirations shaping each collection.

contactPage.description: Contact forms, studio visits, and collaboration inquiries will live here. Connect with the atelier to commission bespoke art or to schedule an immersive viewing.

errors.library: We couldn't load the WebAR libraries.
errors.missingMarker: The targets.mind file is missing. Place it in public/assets/works/{{id}}.
errors.missingModel: The 3D model is missing. Add model.glb or model.gltf to public/assets/works/{{id}}.

instructions.missingAssets: Ensure targets.mind and the 3D model are stored in public/assets/works/{{id}}.
instructions.noMarkerFile: Add marker.(png|jpg|jpeg|webp) to offer a downloadable marker.

header.title: Augmented reality
header.subtitle: Point your device at the marker to visualise the artwork.

home.title: AvantArt — Avant-garde digital art studio
home.description: Discover immersive avant-garde artworks, curated collections, and bespoke commissions from the AvantArt studio.
home.keywords: avant-garde art, contemporary artist, digital gallery, immersive art

catalog.title: Catalogue — AvantArt
catalog.description: Browse curated works across media, years, and formats from the AvantArt collection.
catalog.keywords: art catalogue, avant-garde works, art for sale, contemporary art

work.title: AvantArt — {{title}}
work.description: Explore {{title}} ({{year}}) and discover its story, dimensions, and investment details within the AvantArt collection.
work.loadingDescription: Fetching artwork details from the AvantArt collection.
work.notFoundDescription: The requested artwork is unavailable. Continue exploring the catalogue of avant-garde pieces.

about.title: About the artist — AvantArt
about.description: Learn about the AvantArt artist, their manifesto, and the inspirations behind each collection.
about.keywords: artist biography, avant-garde manifesto, art story

contact.title: Contact — AvantArt
contact.description: Reach out to the AvantArt studio for commissions, collaborations, or private viewings.
contact.keywords: contact artist, commission art, art studio contact

cart.title: Cart — AvantArt
cart.description: Review your selected artworks and confirm delivery details with AvantArt.
cart.keywords: art cart, reserve artwork, avant-garde purchase

dashboard.title: Collector dashboard — AvantArt
dashboard.description: Manage your AvantArt profile, orders, and conversations with the studio.
dashboard.keywords: collector dashboard, art orders, customer portal

orderHistory.title: Order history — AvantArt
orderHistory.description: Track every AvantArt reservation and monitor fulfilment statuses.
orderHistory.keywords: art order history, collector records, avant-garde purchases

adminOrders.title: Studio orders — AvantArt admin
adminOrders.description: Oversee collector purchases, logistics, and statuses across the AvantArt studio.
adminOrders.keywords: admin orders, art logistics, studio management

adminWorks.title: Manage artworks — AvantArt admin
adminWorks.description: Create, edit, and curate artworks within the AvantArt catalogue.
adminWorks.keywords: artwork management, admin catalogue, avant-garde works

adminChats.title: Studio conversations — AvantArt admin
adminChats.description: Respond to collector messages and manage the AvantArt studio inbox.
adminChats.keywords: collector chat, studio communications, admin inbox
adminChats.restrictedDescription: Admin rights are required to access the AvantArt studio conversations.

login.title: Sign in — AvantArt
login.description: Access your AvantArt collector dashboard and continue the conversation with the studio.
login.keywords: art login, collector sign in, avant-garde account

register.title: Create account — AvantArt
register.description: Register to save favourites, manage orders, and receive AvantArt studio updates.
register.keywords: register collector, join art studio, create art account

arView.title: Augmented reality viewer — AvantArt
arView.description: Launch the augmented reality experience for artwork {{id}} from the AvantArt studio.
arView.keywords: AR art, augmented reality viewer, AvantArt AR
arView.loadingDescription: Loading augmented reality assets for artwork {{id}}.

notFound.description: The requested page could not be found within the AvantArt experience.
